entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Investigate adding "phantom" replacements during physical promotion #87371
  • Strange behavior with multiline Regex #87368
  • Example of building and testing libraries doesn't work #87367
  • [API Proposal]: Add access to StringBuilder content by using ReadOnlySequence<char> #87362
  • [API Proposal]: Make LargeArrayBuilder public #87361
  • The given key 'size' was not present in the dictionary in coreclr libraries outerloop tests #87359
  • CoreXml.Test.XLinq.XNodeBuilderFunctionalTests.RunTests failed with mismatch #87358

Closed

  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfoTests.DriveInfoUnixTests.TestGetDrives fails on devices #60586
    8.0.0
  • Process terminated. Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib - Argument_InvalidResourceCultureName #86441
    Future
  • osx-arm64 packs subset build break #87333
  • [JSInterop] Application hangs when using JSHost.ImportAsync from main.js #87365
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\pinnedlocal\\pinnedlocal.cmd #83172
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #80745
    8.0.0
  • [Bug] AssemblyLoadContext with unoading enabled will not unload when it contains compiled linq expressions or dynamic objects #87199
  • Disable slow Regex test on debug CLR #87363
  • Numerical < and == comparisons aren't fused into <= #78385
    8.0.0
  • RequiresDynamicCode based on interface implementation #85829
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: An HTTP/2 connection could not be established because the server did not complete the HTTP/2 handshake #86142

PullRequests

Created

  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Prototype] Make idSmallCns signed on xarch #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP do more BGCs #87372
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Account for return writebacks in physical promotion heuristics #87370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops for NonBacktracking engine #87369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix parameter ordering and value in gtNewColonNode #87366
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Double.NegativeZero #87364
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Emit pointer alignment before config knobs #87360
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable DriveInfoUnix test on tvOS #87162
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87152
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in vm #87310
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Mark GeneratedComClass code as generated #87342
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Remove unused methods in cgencpu.h #87357
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump HandleHistogram32::SIZE to 16 #87332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify ManagedWebSocket.ApplyMask #87331
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix Stubs for Generics #87316
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on the simulator and maccatalyst on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • WIP don't set mark array bits during concurrent marking #87261
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • WIP don't set mark array bits during concurrent marking and do more frequent BGCs #87311
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2197986 #87296
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Move System.Transactions.Local over to using source-generated COM instead of built-in COM whenever possible. #87351
    area-System.Transactions
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast in AnyNSearchValues<T, TImpl> types #85868
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update debugging-vscode.md #87338
    area-Meta
  • Allow bigger json parsing to JsonDocument #87343
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix validation on build #87354
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Warn in CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Tweak dotnet-pgo to be flexible to changes from class to valuetype for application types #87355
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build projects due to Xcode mismatch #33161

PullRequests

Created

  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged
  • Default container image tags to latest instead of versions #33132
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33159
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33160
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] [Feature Suggestion]: Automatic formatting for raw string literals #68537
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Closing parenthesis of pointer-type cast is colored incorrectly #68536
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Commas after non-array elements in JSON-like strings are colored incorrectly #68534
  • Is this issue still on the resolution list to be resolved? #68533

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing comma classification in json classification #68535
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not lower priority for refactorings #68530
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove CPD attribute on DiaSymReader dependency #68523
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48704
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json #48703
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes #48702
  • Changelog #48700
  • Perf improvement: mvc #48699

Closed

  • SignalR KeepAlive Interval not being honored - Blazor Server #48675
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, plaintext #48676
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mapaction #48695
  • Routing, exception and hosting metrics #48670
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json, updates #48684
  • Add Counters & Logs for 404s and MapFallback #46404
  • DataProtectionProvider.Create(string applicationName, X509Certificate2 certificate) never works #48079

PullRequests

Created

  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add routing metrics #48637
    area-middleware, 8.0-preview6
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Add unhandled request log and metric to hosting #48669
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    area-signalr, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Proof of concept for extending http logging #48679
    area-runtime
